name: Giorgio Bacci
content: Giorgio Bacci: home Home Short biography I'm an Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science, Aalborg University, Denmark, within the Distributed, Embedded, and Intelligent Systems (DEIS) Unit. Until December 2012 I was a Ph.D. student at the Dept. of Mathematics and Computer Science (DiMI), University of Udine, under the supervision of Prof. Marino Miculan. I received the Bachelor and Master degree in Computer Science at the University of Udine, in October 2005 and 2008, respectively, both with full marks (110/110 cum laude). curriculum vitae: (updated 2018) My Recent Scientific Service to the CS Community Consider submitting your work to these conferences ACM/IEEE Symposium on Logic in Computer Science, LICS 2025 (PC member) International Colloquium on Automata, Languages, and Programming, ICALP 2025 - Track B (PC member) Conference on Mathematical Foundations of Programming Semantics, MFPS 2025 (PC member) Combined international workshops on Expressiveness in concurrency and Structural Operational Semantics EXPRESS/SOS 2025 (Co-chair) International Symposium on Games, Automata, Logics, and Formal Verification GandALF 2025 (Co-chair) Contact informations affiliation: Department of Computer Science, Aalborg University address: Selma Lagerl√∂fs Vej 300, DK-9220 Aalborg, Denmark (map) office: 1.2.11 (First cluster, 1st floor, Room 11), Cassiopeia building phone: +45 9940 9859 fax: +45 9940 9798 e-mail: @ skype: (send an email first) google+: (send an email first) valid XHTML | CSS Giorgio Bacci Index home research teaching publications talks links Quick contacts phone: +45 9940 9859 office: 1.2.11, Cassiopeia e-mail: @
